ai-patthana23.18:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana23.18:0.3_0: he deposited himself with the previous ones.
ai-patthana23.18:1.1_0: Knowing the teaching, the skillful, not the supported by the teaching,
ai-patthana23.18:2.1_0: So skilled in what is not to listen to the teaching.
ai-patthana23.18:3.1_0: not skilled in the supports, supported by the Realized One, and the basis for ending.
ai-patthana23.18:4.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful.
